topic: Sky brightness in the middle east
body:
Hi all,


Does anyone know, have any data, or know where I can
find data on sky brightness in the middle east,
specifically UAE, Oman, Bahrain, Qatar and Saudi?


Ideally, a frequency distribution of illuminances
would be great, or even just the illuminance values
for a 15%, 50% and 85% CIE design sky. 


Cheers


Nick
